title: GitHub Pre-release Distribution & Auto-Update
description: Implement automated GitHub Releases for pre-release builds and in-app update detection. This epic covers the end-to-end setup from CI/CD to in-app installation.

title: GH-01: GitHub CLI Setup & Auth
description: Install 'gh' CLI and run 'gh auth login' to authenticate with the repository. Verify using 'gh auth status'. This is the entry point for managing repository secrets.

title: GH-02: Build Asset Preparation
description: Generate a release JKS keystore (attendance-release.jks). Also obtain the Google OAuth client secret JSON (used for Sheets access). Both must be converted to Base64 (cat file | base64) to be stored as GitHub Secrets.

title: GH-03: Secret Configuration (GH-CLI)
description: Use 'gh secret set' to upload the following to the repo: SIGNING_KEY (Base64 JKS), GOOGLE_OAUTH_JSON (Base64 JSON), KEY_STORE_PASSWORD, KEY_ALIAS, and KEY_PASSWORD. These enable the CI/CD to sign and run the app.

title: GH-04: Beta Release Workflow Implementation
description: Create '.github/workflows/release-beta.yml' that triggers on 'v*-beta' tags. It must decode secrets, sign the APK with 'r0adkll/sign-android-release', and publish to GitHub Releases using 'softprops/action-gh-release' with 'prerelease: true'.

title: APP-01: Update Detection Logic (Beta)
description: Implement 'UpdateManager' using the GitHub Releases API (api.github.com/repos/.../releases). Compare 'BuildConfig.VERSION_NAME' with the latest release tag (SemVer). Should specifically look for '-beta' tags when the channel is set to Beta.

title: APP-02: Update Channel UI
description: Add 'Update Channel' (Stable/Beta) and 'Check for Update' to the Main List overflow menu. Persist choice in SharedPreferences. Trigger UpdateManager manually or on app start.

title: APP-03: In-App APK Installer
description: Handle APK download to local storage. Configure 'FileProvider' in 'AndroidManifest.xml' to share the file. Execute 'Intent.ACTION_VIEW' with 'application/vnd.android.package-archive' to launch the system installer.

### Description
Implement logic to auto-create local attendee placeholders during the `fetchAttendanceForEvent` pull if they are missing locally. This ensures all attendees for any events viewed are available for offline operations, even if they have been removed from the master list.

- Set `notExistOnCloud = true` for these placeholders (they will be reconciled or confirmed on subsequent master list syncs).

title: Optimize Attendance Pull and Fix Batch Reduction
description:
### Description
Optimize Attendance record pulls using trigger-specific logic and gap-aware row-based differential pull detection.

### Requirements
- **Data Layer**:
    - Update 'Event' entity with 'lastProcessedRowIndex: Int' (default: 0).
    - Update 'PushResult' in 'AttendanceCloudProvider.kt' to include 'lastRowIndex: Int'.
- **Gap-Aware Push Logic (SyncWorker)**:
    - Local index (M), Batch size (K). Cloud returns (N).
    - **Clean Push**: If N == M + K, update local 'lastProcessedRowIndex = N'.
    - **Gap Detected**: If N > M + K, **DO NOT** update 'lastProcessedRowIndex'. Leave it at M. This ensures the next 'PullWorker' run will fetch the missed rows (and re-fetch the pushed rows for consistency).
- **Pull Logic (PullWorker)**:
    - **Integrity Gate**: Skip the pull if 'syncJobDao.getPendingCount() > 0'.
    - **Differential Pull**: Fetch rows from 'M+1' to current cloud end.
    - **Update**: Set 'lastProcessedRowIndex' to the cloud's current end index after a successful pull.
- **Trigger-Specific Logic**:
    - **Periodic Sync**: ONLY pull for active event. Skip Master Lists/metadata.
    - **Event Screen**: ONLY pull Event metadata. Skip attendance records.
- **Batch Reduction**:
    - Reduce cloud batches to the latest record per attendee (max timestamp) before insertion.

title: Refactor AuthManager to use Jetpack DataStore + Google Tink
description:
Refactor the authentication storage to resolve deprecation warnings.

Current State:
- AuthManager uses EncryptedSharedPreferences and MasterKey, which are deprecated.
- Warnings are currently suppressed at the file level in AuthManager.kt.

Goal:
- Migrate from SharedPreferences to Jetpack DataStore.
- Integrate Google Tink for data encryption.
- Ensure all auth operations remain secure and handle the asynchronous nature of DataStore (Flow/Suspend).

title: Implement Entity Placeholder Logic during Pulls
description:
### Description
Handle missing local entities (Attendees/Groups) discovered during master list or mapping pulls by creating placeholders.

### Requirements
- If an attendee in a mapping is missing locally, create it with `fullName = id` and `notExistOnCloud = true`.
- If a group in a mapping is missing locally, create it with `name = groupId` and `notExistOnCloud = true`.
- Auto-clear `notExistOnCloud` flag if entity is re-discovered in a future pull.

title: Overhaul Cloud Sync Resolution Screen and Bottom Sheets

### Description

### Requirements
- Display Attendee/Group IDs in list items.
- Remove swipe-to-delete and 'Clear All' button.
- Tap item opens a bottom sheet with manual resolution steps and a 'Remove locally' button (delete icon).
- Attendee removal dependency: No local attendance records or group mappings. Removal only after event expiry (30 days).
- Group removal dependency: No group mapping entries.
- UI: Show rotating sync icon in TopBar during processing. Display errors inline in bottom sheet. Sheet stays open until action completes.

title: Optimize Master Sync with Conditional Pulls
description:
### Description
Optimize Master List (Attendees, Groups, Mappings) synchronization by restricting its execution to specific triggers and using version-based conditional pulls.

### Requirements
- **Trigger Restriction**:
    - Step 1, 2, and 3 (Attendees, Groups, Mappings) should ONLY be performed during **Full Sync** triggers: Login, Application Start, or Manual Sync.
    - These steps must be SKIPPED during the periodic background 'PullWorker' sync to save bandwidth.
- **Version-Based Check (within Full Sync)**:
    - Even during Full Sync, skip the pulls if 'cloudProvider.fetchMasterListVersion()' matches the local 'localMasterListVersion' stored in SharedPreferences.
    - Leverage cloud-native metadata (e.g., file 'version' or 'modifiedTime') without creating new data on the cloud.
- **Manual Overrides**:
    - 'clearAllData()' must reset the local version to force a fresh pull.

title: Refactor Cloud Sync Icons and Single Error Banner

- Do not add color directly to the AppIcon resourceId.
- Use only a single error banner in the dialog, updating its content as needed.
